definition: document folded in accordion form/to fold
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to sell at a 50% discount/to fold in two
memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)
memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)
variant of 折線|折线[zhe2 xian4], broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg

sentences.english: That boy is so careless that his books are dog-eared.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩真粗心，他的書本都已經摺角了。

sentences.english: The feature that defines the Scottish fold breed is the forwardfolding of the ears.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭摺耳貓的品種特徵，就是向前折下的耳朵。

sentences.english: And strange to say the ordinary, just pick a fold down switchgrass.
sentences.chinese: 說來奇特而又普通，就只是一根隨手摺下來的柳枝。

sentences.english: The dragster actually snapped in two and burst into flames. Amazingly, the driver walked away.
sentences.chinese: 這輛高速賽車實際上已經摺斷成兩截並着火。

sentences.english: Before he could attempt to recover it, it was broken, and behind the fire.
sentences.chinese: 在他想奪回來以前，菸斗已經摺斷，扔在火裏了。

sentences.english: The edges of the admission ticket have been lapped over.
sentences.chinese: 入場券的四邊已經摺起來了。

sentences.english: He also bends a shrub with his hand, improving the area of his intended swing.
sentences.chinese: 他還用手摺彎了一個矮樹，改善了意欲揮杆的區域。

sentences.english: I folded the letter and then put it into the envelope.
sentences.chinese: 我把信摺好後裝進信封。

sentences.english: I can't seem to fling off this cold;it's been troubling me for a month now.
sentences.chinese: 我的感冒似乎好不了啦，它已經摺磨我一個月了。

sentences.english: Norton, what a lucky, smart, happy cat!
sentences.chinese: 一隻蘇格蘭摺耳貓的精彩的貓生。

sentences.english: He sat down and started folding the clean clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他坐下來並開始摺衣服。

sentences.english: To avoid staining the Rebirth Blanket, one can also fold it into a small piece, and put it inside the urn.
sentences.chinese: 爲避免往生被沾污，亦可將之摺爲小塊，放入壇內。

sentences.english: Perconte, what are you thinking of blousing your pants?
sentences.chinese: 派康提，你幹嘛摺你的褲管？

sentences.english: The twigs had always to be broken, and never cut with a knife.
sentences.chinese: 它的小枝必須用手摺斷，而絕不能用刀砍。

sentences.english: A bi-fold wallet made of leather.
He snapped away from them, his white folds swirling crisply in the air.
sentences.chinese: 他咬斷遠離他們，他的在空氣中脆地搖晃的白色摺層。

definition: to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
old variant of 秉[bing3]/variant of 柄[bing3]/handle/shaft
variant of 並|并[bing4]/variant of 併|并[bing4]
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
